div.div: Augsburg College vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: SJU won the toss and defers, Augsburg chooses to receive.
Alexi Johnson kickoff 53 yards to the AUG12, Jerise Washington return 28 yards to the AUG40 (Ben Krebsbach).
Jerise Washington rush for 3 yards to the AUG43 (Nate Blenker).
Phil Putratz rush for 6 yards to the AUG49 (Darryl Williams;Matt Workman).
Jerise Washington rush for 7 yards to the SJU44, 1ST DOWN AUG (Drake Matuska).
Ayrton Scott pass incomplete to Scott Bossard (Andrew Rose).
PENALTY AUG false start 5 yards to the SJU49.
